_header: Hail Mary Virgin so full of grace
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: Ave Maria — one stanza rhyme royal

BodRawB408.First Lines:
Hayle mary virgyn so ful of graceOure lorde almyghty is fully with
                    þe…
BodRawB408.Last Lines:
…Ihesus oure lorde god is sone and þynePray hym for us
                    blessid lady myne
BodRawB408.Attributed Title:
Aue maria gracia plena dominus tecum benedicta tu in mulieribus et
                        cetera (f. 4)
BodRawB408.Editions:
Clark,  Andrew,
                        ed.
